body:
Well i jus felt like sharing this with you guys:

So one day a few years ago when i wanted an iphone so much i decided to do some drawing/designs for new iphones I spent ages drawing ad labling.Aftr completing the design i wrote a letter (hand written) to apple explaing my desgin and giving them my adress.So later that day i seach for an apple HQ and the neares one was in ireland so i sent it off.

About 5 months later i get a parsel from fedex, knowig tha no one i know uses fedex i guessed it was from apple and thought it onatned a phone due to the size anyway i open it and theres all the confedentials from apple and a small letter.

The leter said:
Thanks for the drawing & ideas Alex.My best ,Jony

My dad says something along the lines of :
We sent it to Ireland they looked at it and sent it to america they looked at it thought it was good and sent it to Jony.

Proof:http://imgur.com/a/umXXM

P.s Jony is joathen ive (head designer at apple)

-Thanks Whale
